thread.title: Barcelona news: Neymar overtakes Ronaldinho record at Barcelona | Metro News
thread.title_full: Barcelona news: Neymar overtakes Ronaldinho record at Barcelona | Metro News

author: Chris Davie For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Barcelona news: Neymar overtakes Ronaldinho record at Barcelona | Metro News
text:
Chris Davie for Metro.co.uk Saturday 11 Feb 2017 5:07 pm Neymar has overtaken Ronaldinho’s goal record at Barcelona. (Getty Images) 
Neymar has overtaken Ronaldinho by scoring his 95th goal for Barcelona. 
The Brazilian scored the second in Barca’s 6-0 victory over Alaves to take his tally to one ahead of his countryman. 
Ronaldinho, who won two La Liga titles and the Champions League in his five years at Camp Nou, scored 94 goals for the Spanish giants. 
Neymar was signed from Santos in 2013 and has needed just four seasons to beat Ronaldinho’s record. Ronaldinho scored 94 goals for Barcelona. (AFP/Getty Images) Neymar celebrates his goal vs Alaves. (Getty Images) 
The 6-0 win over Alaves has put Barcelona ahead of Real Madrid by two points at the top of La Liga, although Zinedine Zidane’s side have three games in hand. 
Luis Suarez scored twice in the victory, while Lionel Messi and Ivan Rakitic found the target. Alaves defender Alexis also put the ball into his own net.
